channel.title: Regicide - A Remake of UnScape
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt][b][font=impact]Regicide[/font][/b][/size] Regicide is a remake of an old server called UnScape. UnScape was shutdown over 4 years ago. UnScape was a server that I played and enjoyed with many other friends. It was actually one of my very first RuneScape Private Servers. I enjoyed the game so much that I wanted to keep on playing it even after it got shutdown. Here I am bringing you guys Regicide.
[b]Note: The server is still under construction, but it's playable and can still be enjoyable at this state.[/b]
We are currently on a free webhost due to the server just being released. I do own vBulletin Forums and plan on using them once we get some donations.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hIVuX.png[/img][B][URL=http://regicide-rsps.forumotion.com/forum]Forums: Click Here[/URL][/B] [IMG]http://i380.photobucket.com/albums/oo245/zamorak_album_2008/webclient.png[/img][B][URL=http://regicide-rsps.forumotion.com/?pid=2]Play Now: Click Here[/URL][/B]
[size=14pt][b]Features:[/b][/size] -Beginners Training Area -Amazing PK -Skill in unique places -Dragon Caves -Easy Access Shops -Clan Chat -and more on login!
[B][U]More features coming soon we just released the server. [/U][/B] Please take note that the server was just released so there won't be many players online at the moment.
[b]Media[/b] [IMG]http://i1261.photobucket.com/albums/ii586/regici12/b64ae15e.jpg[/img] [b]Beginners Training Area[/b] [IMG]http://i1261.photobucket.com/albums/ii586/regici12/39d7cf50.jpg[/img] [b]Woodcutting Area[/b] [IMG]http://i1261.photobucket.com/albums/ii586/regici12/e6747cf0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1261.photobucket.com/albums/ii586/regici12/dcefc6de.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i1261.photobucket.com/albums/ii586/regici12/f663a913.jpg[/img] [b]Spectate Pkers from the Safezone[/b] [IMG]http://i1261.photobucket.com/albums/ii586/regici12/844abda8.jpg[/img] [b]Quest Tab Options[/b] [IMG]http://i1261.photobucket.com/albums/ii586/regici12/8d59516a.jpg[/img] [/center]

item.title: Regicide - A Remake of UnScape
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

[quote=“Travas, post:16, topic:459151”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=562055.msg4099135#msg4099135 date=1347228892]

Name already used. How do I know? I released a server named Regicide. I used it first. Just saying. Try to add something to the end so people don’t get it mixed up. Good luck.

Does it really matter? Maybe you should add something to the end of “Runite” in your server, because JaGeX used it first and people might get mixed up.
[/quote]

this.

Really, ‘Regicide’ is not copyrighted, so people can use it whenever and however they want.[/quote]I never said they couldn’t or shouldn’t, I just said he might want to add to the name like Project or something else so it doesn’t get mixed up with another server released, or that is already out.

Read full topic

item.title: Regicide - A Remake of UnScape
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:15, topic:459151”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=562055.msg4099123#msg4099123 date=1347228441]
Name already used. How do I know? I released a server named Regicide. I used it first. Just saying. Try to add something to the end so people don’t get it mixed up. Good luck.
[/quote]
Does it really matter? Maybe you should add something to the end of “Runite” in your server, because JaGeX used it first and people might get mixed up.[/quote]

this.

Really, ‘Regicide’ is not copyrighted, so people can use it whenever and however they want.

Read full topic

item.title: Regicide - A Remake of UnScape

item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

Name already used. How do I know? I released a server named Regicide. I used it first. Just saying. Try to add something to the end so people don’t get it mixed up. Good luck.

Does it really matter? Maybe you should add something to the end of “Runite” in your server, because JaGeX used it first and people might get mixed up.

item.title: Regicide - A Remake of UnScape
item.dc:creator: @tinyscape TinyScape
item.description:
@tinyscape wrote:

There’s been a lot of servers with the same names as others. That’s why I chose TinyScape for mine because I knew nobody would use such a shitty fucked up name.

EDIT: There’s another server called TinyScape. What the fuck.

Read full topic

item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Name already used. How do I know? I released a server named Regicide. I used it first. Just saying. Try to add something to the end so people don’t get it mixed up. Good luck.

item.title: Regicide - A Remake of UnScape
item.dc:creator: @RegicideRSPS RegicideRSPS
item.description:
@RegicideRSPS wrote:

[center][size=18pt][font=impact]Regicide[/font][/size]
Regicide is a remake of an old server called UnScape. UnScape was shutdown over 4 years ago. UnScape was a server that I played and enjoyed with many other friends. It was actually one of my very first RuneScape Private Servers. I enjoyed the game so much that I wanted to keep on playing it even after it got shutdown. Here I am bringing you guys Regicide.

Note: The server is still under construction, but it’s playable and can still be enjoyable at this state.

We are currently on a free webhost due to the server just being released. I do own vBulletin Forums and plan on using them once we get some donations.

Forums: Click Here
Play Now: Click Here

[size=14pt]Features:[/size]
-Beginners Training Area
-Amazing PK
-Skill in unique places
-Dragon Caves
-Easy Access Shops
-Clan Chat
-and more on login!

More features coming soon we just released the server.

Please take note that the server was just released so there won’t be many players online at the moment.
